item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, December 27, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Russia accused of shooting down Azerbaijan passenger plane
2. [Opinion] Are we becoming a post-literate society?
3. Finland seizes Russian shadow fleet oil tanker after cable-cutting incident
4. China’s EV sales set to overtake traditional cars years ahead of west
5. Number of Londoners moving out of UK capital falls to lowest since 2013
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, December 27, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
